name: Santa's Workshop (itch) (sorskoot)
description:
Become an Elf and take control of Santa's Workshop. Fulfill the wishes of the children by wrapping gifts and try not to make them cry... 

Santa's Workshop is an exciting and wonderful game that starts out pretty easy, but becomes challenging as you progress. 

Look closely at the wishlists, grab the gifts from the conveyor belt and wrap them with paper and a bow as shown on the list. You need to remember what you've put in the sacks. 

Instructions:
  • use the trigger to grab objects. 
  • move your hands close together to wrap the gift or add a bow. 
  • drop the gift in the sacks by the lists. 
  • if you have 5 crying children on the cry'o'meter you lose.
Development:

The game is developed during this year's Chrismas-period mostly during my live streams on Twitch. If you like to see and learn how games like this are built, make sure to join https://twitch.tv/sorskoot.

Note:

Please note that a VR headset is REQUIRED to play this game! For the best experience use an Oculus Quest 2!
